 This markdown compares PCAs generated by running PCAngsd on the genotype likelihood (beagle) file outputs of angsd run 1, which uses samtools as the variant caller and angsd run 2, which uses GATK as the variant caller (see AVHonly_ANGSD1_beagles.slurm  and AVHonly_ANGSD2_beagles.slurm in angsd_runs/).
